description: As a leading provider of NGS services and a partner of Illumina, CD Genomics offers a portfolio of solutions for metagenomics sequencing. 16S/18S/ITS amplicon sequencing is characterized by cost-efficiency, high-speed and practicability to help you identify and investigate the microbial community. With over 10 years of experience, we can totally meet your project requirements and budgets in the exploration of microbial biodiversity. If you are interested in what CD Genomics can do with the 16S/18S/ITS Amplicon Sequencing, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are more than happy to be of assistance!
name: 18S Amplicon Sequencing
